title: The Italian Boss's Mistress
description: Her first assignment is...to sleep with her boss.A misunderstanding leads Pippa Stevenson into Andreo D'Alessio's bed. He is a fabulous lover, but all the same, Pippa is overcome with shame because he's her bossHowever, now Andreo has decided that he wants Pippa all to himself, in the boardroom and the bedroom But business and pleasure are a tricky mix, and soon Andreo needs to find a way to persuade Pippa to accept his new proposition--to promote her from mistress to wife
author: Lynne Graham
